samples.context: If someone is extremely tired, then they will seek some rest and relaxation. Today, Jack finds himself utterly exhausted.

qa_pairs.question: Does this entail that he will take rest?
Does this entail that he won't take rest?

samples.context: If a person experiences a throbbing sensation in their head, it is likely that they will seek relief by consuming medication intended to alleviate this discomfort. In this situation, Sarah finds herself with a pounding headache.

qa_pairs.question: Does this mean that she will take medicine?
Does this mean that she won't take medicine?

samples.context: If someone experiences sadness, they will often shed tears. In this particular case, Sara is feeling sorrowful.

qa_pairs.question: Does this entail that she will cry?
Does this entail that she won't cry?

samples.context: If someone possesses strong arithmetic skills, it indicates their potential for excelling in physics as well. Kerry demonstrated their proficiency in arithmetic by achieving high grades.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that she is also good at physics?
Does this imply that she is not good at physics?

samples.context: If an individual experiences joy, they have a tendency to dine out in the evening. Earlier today, Reema experienced joy.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that she will go for dinner outside?
Does this imply that she will not go for dinner outside?

samples.context: If a person experiences a great amount of excitement, they tend to organize and arrange a journey or expedition. Debbie is filled with exhilaration and enthusiasm.

qa_pairs.question: Does this entail that she will plan a trip?
Does this entail that she won't plan a trip?

samples.context: In order to gain admission to IIM, it is mandatory to take the CAT exam. Kevin successfully secured admission to IIM.

qa_pairs.question: Does this entail that he gave CAT exam?
Does this entail that he won't gave CAT exam??

samples.context: If someone fails to arrive on time, they will be unable to catch their designated train. Today, John is running late due to a traffic on his way to station.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that he will miss his train?
Does this entail that he won't miss his train?

samples.context: If an individual is experiencing a migraine, their ability to focus is hindered. In this particular scenario, John happens to have a migraine.

qa_pairs.question: Does this entail that he cannot concentrate?
Does this entail that he can concentrate?

samples.context: If an individual has dedicated numerous hours to studying, they will inevitably begin to experience extreme fatigue. One such person, Julie, has immersed herself in her studies for an extended period.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that she is feeling very tired?
Does this imply that she isn't feeling very tired?

samples.context: If an individual experiences tiredness, they will likely opt to rest by taking a short slumber. There is a person named Tom who is feeling tired.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that he will take a nap?
Does this mean that he won't take a nap?

samples.context: If an individual experiences a sense of excitement, they are inclined to partake in the activity of watching a film. A specific instance involves a person named John, whose emotions are filled with anticipation and enthusiasm.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that he will go for a movie?
Does this mean that he won't go for a movie?

samples.context: If the lights are left on, there will be a penalty to be paid. Unfortunately, Duke forgot to switch them off.

qa_pairs.question: Does this entail that he will have to pay a fine?
Does this imply that he won't have to pay a fine?

samples.context: If an individual is suffering from an infection, it indicates that their immune system is compromised. An example of such a situation can be seen with John, who is presently dealing with an infection.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that he has a weakened immune system?
Does this imply that he doesn't have a weakened immune system?

samples.context: If an individual consumes unhealthy food, weight gain is likely to occur. One specific case in which this applies is when a person named John has been eating unhealthy food.

qa_pairs.question: Does this mean that he will gain weight?
Does this entail that he won't gain weight?

samples.context: If a person becomes enraged, they will raise their voice in anger. In this situation, John is experiencing feelings of intense anger and frustration.

qa_pairs.question: Does this mean that he will shout?
Does this imply that he won't shout?

samples.context: If an individual sustains an injury, they will typically choose to rest and allow their body to recover. In this particular situation, John is dealing with an injury.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that he will take rest?
Does this imply that he won't take rest?

samples.context: If an individual is unable to find their way, they are in need of assistance. John is currently experiencing a situation where he has lost his direction.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that he needs help?
Does this imply that he doesn't need help?

samples.context: If an individual demonstrates perseverance and dedication in their work, they increase their chances of receiving a promotion. Karen, known for her diligent efforts, has consistently shown commendable work ethic and determination.

qa_pairs.question: Does this imply that she will get a promotion?
Does this imply that she won't get a promotion?

samples.context: If an individual possesses limited funds, they are unable to purchase extravagant items. Jane, however, lacks sufficient financial resources.

qa_pairs.question: Does this mean that she cannot afford luxury items?
Does this imply that she can afford luxury items?
